current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To adjust the boundary of the Mojave National Preserve.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Director of the National Park Service

term.#tail: means the Mojave National Preserve established under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 502 of the  California Desert
			 Protection Act of 1994

header.#text: Boundary adjustment of the Mojave National Preserve

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, acquire by donation approximately 4
			 acres of land within or adjacent to the boundary of the preserve to be
			 used for mitigation for every 1 acre of land removed from the preserve
			 under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a/p:2
Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a/p:2

text.#text: prior to any construction on land described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , as generally depicted on the map entitled
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Director of the Bureau of Land
			 Management

text.#text:
on the date of enactment of this Act, transfer administrative jurisdiction of approximately 525
			 acres of land from the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be part of the preserve and the boundary of the
			 preserve shall be adjusted to reflect the acquisition and transfer of
			 administrative jurisdiction of the land under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a
Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be on file and available for public inspection in the
			 appropriate offices of the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a/p:2
Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
as part of the
			 preserve in accordance with all applicable laws (including regulations).

, during the period beginning on the date on which the land
			 is acquired and ending on the date that is 25 years after the date on
			 which the land is acquired; and
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:d/p:2/sp:B

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
on the day before the
			 date of enactment of this Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a/p:1

text.#text: to the same extent permitted on the land referred to in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall permit cattle grazing on the land acquired under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
terminates on the day on which the
			 period described in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:d/p:2/sp:A
Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:d/p:2/sp:A/cl:i
Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a/p:2

text.#text: Subject to valid existing rights, the land transferred under
entry, appropriation, or disposal under the public land laws;
location, entry, and patent under the general mining laws; and
the mining leases, mineral materials, and geothermal leasing laws.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: may, at the discretion of the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mojave National Preserve Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to be included in the preserve if
			 construction has not occurred on the land during the period beginning on
			 the date on which the land is transferred and ending on the date that is
			 10 years after the date on which the land is transferred.
